data.title: Giide.fm Website
data.p1: Created Homepage website from scratch using React.js & AWS.

data.title: Used Car Similar Vehicle Service
data.p1: Database architecture & performance analysis. Microservice for returning vehicle recommendations.
points: Populated MongoDB & PostgreSQL databases with 10M vehicle records
Created relavent APIs using Node/Express for inherited front end
Tuned DB performance with indexing & Redis caching
400% improvement for Postgres, 150% improvement for MongoDB

data.title: Neighborly Eats App
points: Data integration with Yelp Fusion API
